newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Cathay signs sub-lease at new HK airport.
newsitem.headline: Cathay signs sub-lease at new HK airport.

text.p: Hong Kong's Airport Authority said on Friday it had signed a sub-lease with Cathay Pacific Airways Ltd to build a flight training centre and a store building at the territory's new airport.
Total investment amounted to HK$900 million, the authority said in a statement.
The two developments, adjacent to Cathay's new headquarters at the Chek Lap Kok airport, would be completed soon after the airport opens in April 1998, it said.
